dusty_bracelet_seen.description: You notice Dusty's handmade wooden bracelet.

dusty_observed.description: You notice Dusty's protective, warm demeanor.

erik_gummies_seen.description: You notice Erik's emergency stash of THC gummies.

librarian_rare_collection_access.description: Trusted enough to see the rare collection and hear about the Great Spore Incident.

librarian_storm_books_known.description: Learned about books that change during thunderstorms and the student who tried to read them.

librarian_tea_seen.description: A steaming earthenware mug with small mushroom designs etched into it sits on her desk.

poison_expression_seen.description: Their expression shifts between sarcastic and genuinely warm, especially when talking about certain topics.

poison_necklace_seen.description: Poison's wearing a small metal vial necklace. It catches the light strangely, and they sometimes touch it without seeming to realize.

poison_observed.description: You notice Poison's sharp wit barely conceals a deeper loyalty.

poison_peepaw_known.description: Poison explained the necklace contains their grandfather's ashes - a way of keeping family close.

poison_peepaw_memory_stirred.description: Poison mentioned they have a story about their Pee-Paw they'd like to share with you.

poison_peepaw_story_shared.description: Poison recounted sitting on a creaky porch swing, drinking gas station root beer, while Pee-Paw solemnly advised them: 'If you ever find yourself on a roof with a goat and a weathervane, bet on the goat.'

posion_necklace_seen.description: You notice Poison's sharp wit barely conceals a deeper loyalty.

rare_collection_key_seen.description: An ornate brass key hanging from a chain on her belt, alongside several index cards bound with rubber bands.

received_library_map.description: A folded paper sticking out of her jacket pocket, covered in her distinctive purple ink.

shared_mycological_tea.description: Experienced the mild hallucination effects of mushroom tea, seeing shimmering text.
